Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Yâsîn
Nge’Kur’ân, enobulumko
Inene wena ungomnye wabaThunywa
ENdleleni ethe Tye
(Esi) sisiTyhilelo sikaSobunganga, uSozinceba
Khon’ukuze ulumkise abantu (ngaso) abakhokho babo bangazanga balunyukiswe, ngoko (bahleli) bengazi
Inene ilizwi eliyinyani lesohlwayo sele (livakalisiwe) Ngokuchasene noninzi lwabo, ngoko ke abakholwa
Inene, Thina Sibaqamangele ngamakhonkco ezintanyeni zabo ukuya kutsho ezilevini zabo ukuze iintloko zabo (zihlale) ziqwanyile
Kananjalo Sibeke umqobo phambi kwabo nangemva kwabo Sabagquma ukuze bangaboni
Ke kaloku kuyafana kubo nokuba ungabalumkisa okanye ungabalumkisi abayi kukholwa
Wena uya kulumkisa kuphela olandela umyalezo nowoyika uSozinceba Ongabonwayo. Ngoko ke (onjalo) mnike iindaba ezivuyisayo zokuxolelwa nomvuzo omkhulu
Inene SiThi ababuyisela abafileyo ebomini, Sibhale (konke) abakwenzayo nabakushiya ngemva, kwaye zonke izinto Sizibhale eNcwadini ecacileyo
Ke kaloku benzele umzekeliso (wabantu) besixeko (esithile) ekwafika abaThunywa kuso
Sathi Sisakuthumela ababini kubo basuka babaphika, Saza Sabomeleza ngowesithathu, bathi: “Inene thina singabathunywa kuni.”
Bathi bona: “Aninto yimbi nina ngaphandle kokuba ngabantu abafana nathi, kunjalo nje uSozinceba Akananto Ayityhilileyo (kuni) koko nina ningamaxoki.”
Bathi bona: “INkosi yethu Iyazi okokuba singabaThunywa kuni
Yaye thina asinaxanduva lumbi ngaphandle kokuvakalisa uMyalezo ngokucacileyo.”
Bathi bona: “Inene thina sinicingela ukuba ningumhlola ombi. Ukuba aniyeki ke inene siya kunixuluba ngamatye, kwaye inene niya kufunyanwa sisohlwayo esibuhlungu esivela kuthi.”
Bathi bona (abathunywa): “Umhlola ombi ukuni buqu. Ingaba (nikutsho oku) kuba nikhunjuzwa (ngoAllâh) kusini na?” Nakanye nina ningabenzi bobubi.”
Ke kaloku kweza indoda ibaleka, ivela kwicala elikude lesixeko. Yathi: “Hini na bantu bakuthi landelani abaThunywa
Landelani abo banganibizi ntlawulo babe bengabakhokelelekileyo
Ndiya kuthini na ukungamnquli loWo Wandidalayo ekunguYe eniza kubuyiselwa kuYe

Ndingathabatha (thixo) bambi na ngaphandle kwaKhe (lo gama) xa uSozinceba Enokuthi Athande ukuba ndihlelwe bububi intethelelo yabo (thixo benu bobuxoki) ingandincedi nto konke konke, bengekhe bandisindise nokundisindisa
Inene bendingaba sekulahlekeni okucacileyo
Inene mna ndikholiwe eNkosini yenu, ngoko ke ndiphulaphuleni.”
Kwathiwa (kuye:) “Ngena ePaladesi.” Wathi yena: “Akwaba abantu bakuthi babesazi
Okokuba Indixolele kangakanani na iNkosi yam, Yandibeka kunye nabahloniphekileyo.”
Ke kaloku aSizanga Sithumele mkhosi ngokuchasene nabantu bakubo kungazanga kube yimfuneko kananjalo kuThi ukwenza loo nto
Akuzanga kube thuba lingakanani kwakhwazwa kwaba kanye, bacima (pam)
Kwaba njani ke ukuzisola kwezicaka. Akuzanga kufike Mthunywa kubo bangaphoxisi ngaye
Ababonanga na okokuba zingaphi izizukulwana eSazitshabalalisayo kwanokuba ezo (zizukulwana) azisokuze ziphinde zibuyele kubo kwakhona
Ukanti inene, bonke baza kubuyiselwa kuThi
Kanti ke umqondiso wabo ngumhlaba ofileyo. Thina ke Siye Siwubuyisele ebomini Size Sivelise iinkozo abathi badle kuzo
Ke kaloku Sabeka apho imiyezo yemithi yesundu nezidiliya, Senza kwagqabhuka imithombo apho phakathi kuyo
Khona ukuze badle iziqhamo zaKhe. Ukanti ke izandla zabo ayizizo eziyivelisayo, ngoko ke abayi kubulela na
Makazukiswe loWo Wadala zonke (izinto) ngambini zokuhluma emhlabeni nakubo buqu nakoko bangakwaziyo
Kananjalo umqondiso kubo bubusuku. Sisusa ukukhanya kwemini kubo (ubusuku), ukuze babe sebumnyameni
Ukanti lona ilanga libaleka endaweni yalo ukuya endaweni yokuma kwalo. Oko kungummiselo kaSobunganga, uSolwazi
Nenyanga Siyiqingqela izigaba zayo (kangangokuba) ide ibuyele (ibonakale) injengentlava endala yedatilisi
Akuvumelekanga ukuba (ilanga) liyifumane inyanga, bungavumelekanga nobusuku ukuba buyifumane imini kodwa nganye kuzo indanda kwisijikelezisi sayo
Kananjalo umqondiso kubo ngulowo wokuba Sathwala ooyisemkhulu enqanaweni (kaNûh) eyayizele qhu
Yaye Sibadalele okufana noko bakuqhubayo (bakuqabelayo)
Kanti ke ukuba SaSithandile ngeSaSibatshonisile emanzini, kwaye kwakungazi kubakho bani ubavelelayo, babengayi kusinda nokusinda
Ngaphandle kwenceba evela kuThi nembonelelo yokwethutyana
Kodwa xa kusithiwa kubo: “Lumkelani okwangaphambili kunani nokungemva kwenu; mhlawumbi niya kwenzelwa inceba
Kananjalo akukho mqondiso ufikayo kubo uvela kwimiqondiso yeNkosi yabo abangawutshikileliyo

Kanti naxa kusithiwa kubo: ‘Nikelani kumalizo ngoko uAllâh Anibonelele ngako,” Abo bangakholwayo bathi kwabo bakholwayo: “Thina sondle lowo xa uAllâh Ebethanda ngemondle ngokwaKhe? Nina anikho ntweni yimbi ngaphandle kokulahleka okucacileyo.”
Kananjalo bathi: Siya kuba nini na esi sithembiso ukuba nithetha inyaniso?”
(Ukuba bebesazi) akukho nto bayilindileyo ngaphandle kokudubula kwesithongakazi, esiya kubahlasela besalibele kukuphikisa
Kwaye abayi kukwazi (ukunikela imiyalezo) bengayi kubuyela nakubantu bakubo na kakade
Ke kaloku iXilongo liya kuvuthelwa, baze ngoko nangoko baphume emangcwabeni beze eNkosini yabo bengxamile
Baya kuthi: “O yini na kuthi! Ngubani na osivusileyo endaweni yethu yokulala?” (Impendulo iya kuthi): “Oku	koko	uSozinceba	Wakuthembisayo,	yaye abaThunywa babethetha inyaniso.”
Akuyi kuba yinto yimbi ngaphandle kwesithonga esinye baze ngoko nangoko babuyiswe phambi kweThu
Ngoko ke (kuya kuthiwa kubo): “(NaMhlanje) akuyi kubakho mphefumlo uya kwenziwa bugwenxa konke konke, kananjalo aniyi kubuyekezwa ngaphandle koko nakwenzayo.”
Inene amadlelane asePaladesi ngaloo Mini aya kuhleka echulumancile, esebenza imisebenzi (yawo) emihle
Bona nabalingane babo besemthunzini, bengqiyame ngeesofa ezihonjisiweyo
Okwabo apho iya kuba ziziqhamo, yaye okwabo iya kuba yiyo nantoni na abayicelayo (okanye abayinqwenelayo)
“Noxolo,” ilizwi elivela eNkosini uSozinceba
(Uya kuthi Yena): “Yimani ngokwahlukeneyo nina zaphula- mthetho
NdaNdinganiyalelanga na ukuba ningamkhonzi uShaytân, hini na bantwana baka-Adam kuba yena kuni ulutshaba olucacileyo
Kwanokuba nina nqulani Mna kuphela Le yiNdlela ethe Tye
Kananjalo yena phakathi kwenu sele elahlekise inyambalala endalweni, ke ngoko nina naningayisebenzisi ingqiqo
Lo nguMlilo wesiHogo enanithenjiswe ngawo
Yitshani naMhlanje ngenxa yoko nanidla ngokukuphika!”
Ngaloo Mini Siya kuyitywina imilomo yabo, kuze kuthethe izandla zabo kuThi, iinyawo zabo zona ziya kungqina ngoko bakwenzayo
Ke kaloku ukuba SaSithandile ngeSaSibatshabalalisele amehlo abo, baza bakhuphisana (ngokufuna) indlela, phofu babeza kuyibona kanjani
Kananjalo ukuba SaSithandile ngeSabenza baba ziimbedlenge ezindaweni zabo khona ukuze bangakwazi (ukuhamba) baye phambili, bangakwazi nokubuyela umva
Lowo Simnike ubomi obude, Simbuyisela umva endalweni. Ingaba ke ngoku abayi kuqonda
Kananjalo Asizanga Simnike (uMuhammad) ulwazi lobumbongi, kwaye asinto imfaneleyo (leyo). Koko (eSimnike kona) akunto yimbi ngaphandle kokuba ngumyalezo ne’Kurân ecacileyo
Yokulumkisa nabani na ophilayo, kuze kuthetheleleke ilizwi lesilumkiso ngokuchasene nabangakholwayo
Kanti ababoni na okokuba koko kuvela eZandleni zeThu Sibadalele, Sabenzela izilwanyana ezitya ingca, baze babe ngabaninizo
Kananjalo Sizilulamisele bona, ngoko ke ezinye zazo bayaziqabela, ezinye zazo bazitye
Ukanti kwakuzo apho kukwakho nezinye (izinto) eziyinzuzo (kubo) nokuselwayo, ngoko ke abayi kubulela na
Kodwa bazithabathele thixo bambi ngaphandle koAllâh (besithi) mhlawumbi baya kuncedakala
Abakwazi kubanceda nje, ukanti ikwangabo buqu amajoni angabalondolozi babo (thixo babo bobuxoki)
Ngoko ke wena musa ukuvumela iintetho zabo zikukhubekise, Siyakwazi abakufihlayo noko bakuvezayo
Kanti umntu lo akaqapheli na okokuba Samdala ngeqabaza lembewu yomntu? kodwa asuke yena abe ngumchasi ocacileyo
Ade enze umzekelo (ngaThi), alibale ngokudalwa kwakhe athi: “Ngubani oza kunika ubomi emathanjeni asele ethe saa?”
Yithi wena: “Uya kuwanika ubomi loWo Wawavelisayo ekuqalekeni, kwaye Yena phezu kwayo yonke indalo nguSolwazi.”
Yena nguloWo Wanenzela umlilo ngomthi oluhlaza, nenithi niphembe ngawo
Ingaba loWo Wadala amazulu nomhlaba Akakwazi ukudala abanjengabo? Ewe (kunjalo nje) yaye Yena nguSolwazi, uMdali
Yena owaKhe umyalelo ngowokuba Athi xa Enenjongo yento (ethile) Asuke Athi kuyo: “Yibakho,” ibekho (ngoko nangoko)
Ngoko ke Makazukiswe loWo eSandleni saKhe kukho ulongamelo lwezinto zonke, yaye kukuYe apho niza kubuyiselwa khona
